an3.34:1.3: Lobho nidanam kammanam samudayaya, doso nidanam kammanam samudayaya, moho nidanam kammanam samudayaya.
an3.34:2.1: Yam, bhikkhave, lobhapakatam kammam lobhajam lobhanidanam lobhasamudayam, yatthassa attabhavo nibbattati tattha tam kammam vipaccati.
an3.34:2.2: Yattha tam kammam vipaccati tattha tassa kammassa vipakam patisamvedeti, ditthe va dhamme upapajja va apare va pariyaye.
an3.34:3.1: Yam, bhikkhave, dosapakatam kammam dosajam dosanidanam dosasamudayam, yatthassa attabhavo nibbattati tattha tam kammam vipaccati.
an3.34:3.2: Yattha tam kammam vipaccati tattha tassa kammassa vipakam patisamvedeti, ditthe va dhamme upapajja va apare va pariyaye.
an3.34:4.1: Yam, bhikkhave, mohapakatam kammam mohajam mohanidanam mohasamudayam, yatthassa attabhavo nibbattati tattha tam kammam vipaccati.
an3.34:4.2: Yattha tam kammam vipaccati tattha tassa kammassa vipakam patisamvedeti, ditthe va dhamme upapajja va apare va pariyaye.
an3.34:5.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, bijani akhandani aputini avatatapahatani saradani sukhasayitani sukhette suparikammakataya bhumiya nikkhittani.
an3.34:5.3: Evassu tani, bhikkhave, bijani vuddhim virulhim vepullam apajjeyyum.
an3.34:5.4: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, yam lobhapakatam kammam lobhajam lobhanidanam lobhasamudayam, yatthassa attabhavo nibbattati tattha tam kammam vipaccati.
an3.34:5.5: Yattha tam kammam vipaccati tattha tassa kammassa vipakam patisamvedeti, ditthe va dhamme upapajja va apare va pariyaye.
an3.34:6.2: yam mohapakatam kammam mohajam mohanidanam mohasamudayam, yatthassa attabhavo nibbattati tattha tam kammam vipaccati.
an3.34:6.3: Yattha tam kammam vipaccati tattha tassa kammassa vipakam patisamvedeti, ditthe va dhamme upapajja va apare va pariyaye.
an3.34:6.4: Imani kho, bhikkhave, tini nidanani kammanam samudayaya.
an3.34:7.3: Alobho nidanam kammanam samudayaya, adoso nidanam kammanam samudayaya, amoho nidanam kammanam samudayaya.
an3.34:8.1: Yam, bhikkhave, alobhapakatam kammam alobhajam alobhanidanam alobhasamudayam, lobhe vigate evam tam kammam pahinam hoti ucchinnamulam talavatthukatam anabhavankatam ayatim anuppadadhammam.
an3.34:9.1: Yam, bhikkhave, adosapakatam kammam adosajam adosanidanam adosasamudayam, dose vigate evam tam kammam pahinam hoti ucchinnamulam talavatthukatam anabhavankatam ayatim anuppadadhammam.
an3.34:10.1: Yam, bhikkhave, amohapakatam kammam amohajam amohanidanam amohasamudayam, mohe vigate evam tam kammam pahinam hoti ucchinnamulam talavatthukatam anabhavankatam ayatim anuppadadhammam.
an3.34:11.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, bijani akhandani aputini avatatapahatani saradani sukhasayitani.
an3.34:11.4: Masim karitva mahavate va ophuneyya nadiya va sighasotaya pavaheyya.
an3.34:11.5: Evassu tani, bhikkhave, bijani ucchinnamulani talavatthukatani anabhavankatani ayatim anuppadadhammani.
an3.34:11.6: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, yam alobhapakatam kammam alobhajam alobhanidanam alobhasamudayam, lobhe vigate evam tam kammam pahinam hoti ucchinnamulam talavatthukatam anabhavankatam ayatim anuppadadhammam.
an3.34:12.2: yam amohapakatam kammam amohajam amohanidanam amohasamudayam, mohe vigate evam tam kammam pahinam hoti …pe…
an3.34:12.4: Imani kho, bhikkhave, tini nidanani kammanam samudayayati.
